AddVariables(name: list, lower_bound: list, high_bound: list) → None[source]¶

Add variables and corresponding design space sequentially Note: one or more dimensional could be added to the design space sequentially

Parameters

  • name (list) – Names of added variables

  • lower_bound (list) – Lower bound of added design variables

  • high_bound (list) – Higher bound of added design variables

Returns

Return type

None

Sampling(num_samples: int, design_space: dict, seed: int, out_names: list) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame[source]¶

Sampling interface to the user

Parameters

  • num_samples (int) – number of samples

  • design_space (dict) – design space of this problem

  • seed (int) – seed for sampler, for replicating the same results

  • out_names (list) – names of the outputs

Returns

samples – a pandas dataframe to that contains the information of samples

Return type

pandas.DataFrame
